name: Nantucket Bay Scallops or Sweet Maine Shrimp Crudo
keywords: appetizer, bay scallops, lemon juice, shrimp, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound Nantucket bay scallops or sweet Maine shrimp
Juice of 1/2 lime (for scallops) or lemon (for shrimp)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients except the chervil in a bowl, then divide into four small bowls.
Top with the chervil, chill, then serve.
